response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it would also be highly beneficial to someone like yourself. Considering its worth and potential impact, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value received by the new owner. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
